  3. PURPLE

Past members

Dajeong

Introduction

PURPLE was a project girl group duo under ZENTI. Originally as three, they debuted on September 18, 2018 with the digital single "Maemmaeya".

Dajeong is assumed to have left the group after she left Hashtag on March 21, 2023.

The group unofficially disbanded on October 12, 2024 as Hashtag also disbanded.
